languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, вашего внимания требует ситуация на Фолстоуне. Один из служителей Горнила во всеуслышание объявил, что очистился от мирской суеты и является новым воплощением святого Когнация. Есть крайне сомнительные сведения о совершенных им актах чудотворства. При поддержке паствы, собранной во время проповедей, он просит Вашу Светлость отпустить их с Горнилом с Фолстоуна, дабы продолжить дело святого Когнация и использовать реликвию для священного превращения миров, хранящих истинную веру Империума, в сады".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, вашего внимания требует ситуация на Фолстоуне. Один из служителей Горнила во всеуслышание объявил, что очистился от мирской суеты и является новым воплощением святого Когнация. Есть крайне сомнительные сведения о совершенных им актах чудотворства. При поддержке паствы, собранной во время проповедей, он просит Вашу Светлость отпустить их с Горнилом с Фолстоуна, дабы продолжить дело святого Когнация и использовать реликвию для священного превращения миров, хранящих истинную веру Империума, в сады".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, the situation on Foulstone requires your attention. One of the servants tasked with the Crucible's maintenance has declared publicly that he has been liberated of all worldly concerns, for he is none other than the reincarnation of Saint Cognatius. There are some extremely questionable reports claiming that he has performed miracles. Supported by a congregation garnered by preaching, he has asked for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s permission to depart from Foulstone with the Crucible in tow so that he may continue Saint Cognatius's work and use the relic to transform worlds, ones true to the faith of the Imperium, into lush, splendorous gardens."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, вашего внимания требует ситуация на Фолстоуне. traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the situation on Foulstone requires your attention. One of the Crucible's operators has declared publicly that he has renounced his worldly life, for he sees himself as the reincarnation of Saint Cognatius. There are undocumented reports claiming that he has performed miracles. Supported by a congregation he has garnered by preaching, he has pleaded to have him and a group of believers taken from Foulstone along with the Crucible so that they may continue Saint Cognatius's work and use the relic to convert worlds into the true faith of the Imperium."

languages.text: “舰长大人，荒寂岩地的情况需要您的关注。某个负责维护熔炉的仆人公开宣称，说自己超脱了所有世俗侵扰，因为他不是别人，正是圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的转世。某些极其可疑的报道声称，他展现了某些奇迹。在布道集会的支持下，他请求大人您允许他带着熔炉离开荒寂岩地，这样他便可以继续圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的工作，利用圣物把忠于帝国信仰的世界改造成郁郁葱葱的花园。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the situation on Foulstone requires your attention. One of the servants tasked with the Crucible's maintenance has declared publicly that he has been liberated of all worldly concerns, for he is none other than the reincarnation of Saint Cognatius. There are some extremely questionable reports claiming that he has performed miracles. Supported by a congregation garnered by preaching, he has asked for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s permission to depart from Foulstone with the Crucible in tow so that he may continue Saint Cognatius's work and use the relic to transform worlds, ones true to the faith of the Imperium, into lush, splendorous gardens."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, la situación en Rocainmunda requiere su atención. Uno de los sirvientes encargados del mantenimiento del Crisol ha declarado públicamente que ha sido liberado de todas las preocupaciones mundanas, pues no es otro que la reencarnación de san Cognatius. Hay informes muy cuestionables que afirman que ha realizado milagros. Apoyado por una congregación cosechada predicando, os ha pedido permiso para partir de Rocainmunda con el Crisol a cuestas para poder continuar la obra de san Cognatius y utilizar la reliquia para transformar mundos, aquellos fieles a la fe del Imperium, en exuberantes y esplendorosos jardines».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the situation on Foulstone requires your attention. One of the servants tasked with the Crucible's maintenance has declared publicly that he has been liberated of all worldly concerns, for he is none other than the reincarnation of Saint Cognatius. There are some extremely questionable reports claiming that he has performed miracles. Supported by a congregation garnered by preaching, he has asked for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s permission to depart from Foulstone with the Crucible in tow so that he may continue Saint Cognatius's work and use the relic to transform worlds, ones true to the faith of the Imperium, into lush, splendorous gardens."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, la situación en Rocainmunda requiere su atención. Uno de los sirvientes encargados del mantenimiento del Crisol ha declarado públicamente que ha sido liberado de todas las preocupaciones mundanas, pues no es otro que la reencarnación de san Cognatius. Hay informes muy cuestionables que afirman que ha realizado milagros. Apoyado por una congregación cosechada predicando, os ha pedido permiso para partir de Rocainmunda con el Crisol a cuestas para poder continuar la obra de san Cognatius y utilizar la reliquia para transformar mundos, aquellos fieles a la fe del Imperium, en exuberantes y esplendorosos jardines».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ファウルストーンの状況には注意が必要です。坩堝の維持を任されている従者の一人が、自分は世俗的な心配事から解放されたと公言しました。なぜなら、彼自身が聖コグナティウスの生まれ変わりであるからです。彼が奇跡を起こしたという極めて疑わしい報告も届いています。彼は、伝道を通じて集まった信徒団に支えられ、坩堝を携えてファウルストーンを出発する許可を陛下に求めていました。それは、聖コグナティウスの務めを引き継ぎ、聖遺物を使って、帝国信仰に忠誠を誓う惑星を緑豊かな素晴らしい庭園に変えるためです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the situation on Foulstone requires your attention. One of the servants tasked with the Crucible's maintenance has declared publicly that he has been liberated of all worldly concerns, for he is none other than the reincarnation of Saint Cognatius. There are some extremely questionable reports claiming that he has performed miracles. Supported by a congregation garnered by preaching, he has asked for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s permission to depart from Foulstone with the Crucible in tow so that he may continue Saint Cognatius's work and use the relic to transform worlds, ones true to the faith of the Imperium, into lush, splendorous gardens."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ファウルストーンの状況には注意が必要です。坩堝の維持を任されている従者の一人が、自分は世俗的な心配事から解放されたと公言しました。なぜなら、彼自身が聖コグナティウスの生まれ変わりであるからです。彼が奇跡を起こしたという極めて疑わしい報告も届いています。彼は、伝道を通じて集まった信徒団に支えられ、坩堝を携えてファウルストーンを出発する許可を陛下に求めていました。それは、聖コグナティウスの務めを引き継ぎ、聖遺物を使って、帝国信仰に忠誠を誓う惑星を緑豊かな素晴らしい庭園に変えるためです」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, la situation de Rochepeste requiert votre attention. L'un des serviteurs chargés d'entretenir le Creuset a affirmé publiquement avoir été libéré de toutes considérations matérielles, et qu'il serait la réincarnation de Saint Cognatius. Des rapports à la crédibilité plus que douteuse prétendent qu'il a déjà accompli plusieurs miracles. Soutenu par toute une congrégation captivée par ses prêches, il a demandé à Votre Seigneurie la permission de quitter Rochepeste avec le Creuset afin de poursuivre l'œuvre de Saint Cognatius ; il a pour ambition d'utiliser la relique pour transformer les mondes fidèles à la foi de l'Imperium en jardins luxuriants. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the situation on Foulstone requires your attention. One of the servants tasked with the Crucible's maintenance has declared publicly that he has been liberated of all worldly concerns, for he is none other than the reincarnation of Saint Cognatius. There are some extremely questionable reports claiming that he has performed miracles. Supported by a congregation garnered by preaching, he has asked for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s permission to depart from Foulstone with the Crucible in tow so that he may continue Saint Cognatius's work and use the relic to transform worlds, ones true to the faith of the Imperium, into lush, splendorous gardens."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, la situation de Rochepeste requiert votre attention. Des rapports à la crédibilité plus que douteuse prétendent qu'il a déjà accompli plusieurs miracles. Soutenu par toute une congrégation captivée par ses prêches, il a demandé à Votre Seigneurie la permission de quitter Rochepeste avec le Creuset afin de poursuivre l'œuvre de Saint Cognatius ; il a pour ambition d'utiliser la relique pour transformer les mondes fidèles à la foi de l'Imperium en jardins luxuriants. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die Lage auf Foulstone erfordert Eure Aufmerksamkeit. Einer der Diener, die mit der Wartung des Tiegels beauftragt wurden, hat öffentlich erklärt, dass er von allen weltlichen Sorgen befreit worden sei, denn er sei niemand Geringeres als die Reinkarnation des Heiligen Cognatius. Es gibt einige extrem zweifelhafte Berichte über angeblich von ihm gewirkte Wunder. Unterstützt von einer Gemeinde, die er durch seine Predigten versammelt hatte, bat er {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} um Erlaubnis, Foulstone mit dem Tiegel im Gepäck verlassen zu dürfen. Er wollte das Werk des Heiligen Cognatius fortführen und mit dem Relikt Welten verwandeln — treue Welten des Imperiums in grüne, prächtige Gärten verwandeln."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the situation on Foulstone requires your attention. One of the servants tasked with the Crucible's maintenance has declared publicly that he has been liberated of all worldly concerns, for he is none other than the reincarnation of Saint Cognatius. languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Menfurtaş'taki vaziyetle ilgilenmeniz gerekiyor. Pota'nın bakımıyla görevlendirilen hizmetkârlardan biri, herkesin gözü önünde tüm dünyevi endişelerden bağını kopardığını çünkü kendisinin Aziz Cognatius'un yeniden doğmuş hâli olduğunu iddia etti. Mucizeler gerçekleştirdiğine dair son derece şüpheli raporlar bulunuyor. Vaazlarla kazanç sağlayan bir meclisin desteğiyle Aziz Cognatius'un uğraşlarını sürdürmek için Pota'yı himayesi altına alarak Menfurtaş'tan ayrılmak ve yadigârı kullanarak dünyaları İmparatorluk'a inançlı insanlarla ve yemyeşil, ihtişamlı bahçelerle dolu bir hâle getirmek için {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin iznini istedi."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the situation on Foulstone requires your attention. One of the servants tasked with the Crucible's maintenance has declared publicly that he has been liberated of all worldly concerns, for he is none other than the reincarnation of Saint Cognatius.
